wybug_title: 强智教务系统数据库连接信息泄露#影响大量学校
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-20：	厂商主动忽略漏洞，细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放（绿盟科技、唐朝安全巡航）									2015-12-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 信息泄露可能给攻击者提供进一步的信息 详细说明：  数据库连接信息泄露可能造成进一步伤害泄露地址：/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp案例：http://**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jiaowu_2008/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/dhjw/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jiaowu_2008/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**:8080/oa//jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jiaowu//jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu//jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu2008//jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jiaowu//jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**:8181/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu2008/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu2008/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**:9000/jwc/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asphttp://**.**.**.**/jiaowu_2008/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp   漏洞证明：  http://**.**.**.**/jiaowu/jwgl/jxjh/jxjha.asp
